product.title: 101 Dalmatians II | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
101 Dalmatians II: Patch’s London Adventure

Based on the 2003 animated feature, this thrilling tale centers on Patch’s desire to be unique, and to resist living in the shadows of his 100 sisters and brothers. When Patch learns that Cruella De Vil has kidnapped his brothers and sisters, he enlists the help of Thunderbolt, his TV idol, and soon realizes just how special and unique he really is.

Tie-In Activity: Help your child focus on his individuality by having him pinpoint his unique qualities and traits. Together, discuss how each of these unique qualities makes him stand apart from other children, and how they play a role in establishing his individuality.
